snippet.title: NKD Agility. Your Partner in Cost Effective Software Development
snippet.description:

Creating a culture of engineering excellence is not about enforcing valuesâ€”itâ€™s about transforming your system of delivering value. In this video, we explore how Naked Agility helps organizations define, measure, and optimize their systems to achieve maximum value and technical leadership.
